lines.text: Hi, Charlie, how'd you sleep last night?
No good. I was up all night trying to get the window open.
But there's no window in that room.
No wonder I couldn't get it open!
One hamburger and close the window.
One hamburger and close the window! Close the window?
Gee that's funny. Most people ask me to open the window.
Yeah, well, close the window this time. The hamburger I had yesterday blew off the plate three times.
